SPAMc 42 crop and crop groups each split into four agricultural systems: subsistence, rainfed low-input, rainfed high-input and irrigated. Grid cell values are allocated subject to a set of constraints that capture information on the location of crops at the subnational level, cropland surface and irrigated area.
